content: fan dance crochet terms american skill level advanced beginner to intermediate finished size 12 inches gauge first 3 rounds almost 4 inches materials worsted weight yarn crochet hook size 12 afghan block i/5 5mm yarn needle abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch double_crochet = double_crochet space = space half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet st = stitch r # = round number treble_crochet = treble_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet yo = yarn over skip = skip designer s notes this is the 2016 refresh of fan dance my fi rst ever published pattern i didn t change much in the written pattern i updated some wording and grammar to my newer standards but i left most of the pattern as it was it s been made so many times i didn t want to take away what everyone is familiar with just to smooth it over and polish it a bit polly plum please visit everytrickonthehook com for a round by round photo tutorial a pattern special stitches commence pattern bpsc/bpdc/bptr - like normal single_crochet double_crochet or treble_crochet but instead of in- begin with double magic_ring or use chain loop if you serting hook at the top of indicated stitch insert it from prefer back to front around the post of stitch round 1 ch3 counts as fi rst double_crochet here and throughout 11 double_crochet into magic_ring close magic_ring slip_stitch to fi rst double_crochet to join standing single_crochet - to start a round with slip knot on hook insert 12 double_crochet hook into indicated stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through two loops on hook round 2 with same yarn ch3 or with new yarn standing double_crochet in any double_crochet double_crochet in same st 2dc in next double_crochet 11 times slip_stitch to standing bpsc - to start a round with slip knot on hook fi rst double_crochet to join insert hook from back to front around post of indicated 24 double_crochet stitch yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through two loops on hook note you ll only be working in every other space between stitches this round not into the stitches themselves v_stitch - double_crochet ch1 double_crochet round 3 with same yarn slip_stitch into next double_crochet and then slip_stitch into space between that double_crochet and the next double_crochet or with new yarn puff - yo insert hook into indicated space and pull up a loop standing double_crochet in the space between any group of 2dc ch1 4 times yo and pull through all 9 loops on hook ch1 note double_crochet in same space counts as fi rst v ch1 skip next 2 double_crochet v the ch1 at the end of the puff creates the eye of the puff in space between double_crochet ch1 11 times slip_stitch to fi rst double_crochet to join and does not count towards any additional chs that may fasten_off come after the puff 12 v stitches 12 ch1 space bptr-v - back post treble v_stitch bptr ch1 bptr original design by polly
